verses.verse: For I would<WG2309> that you knew<WG1492> what<WG2245> great<WG2245> conflict<WG73> I have<WG2192> for you, and for them at<WG1722> Laodicea,<WG2993> and for as many<WG3745> as have not seen<WG3708> my face<WG4383> in the flesh;<WG4561>

That their hearts<WG2588> might be comforted,<WG3870> being knit<WG4822> together<WG4822> in love,<WG26> and to all<WG3956> riches<WG4149> of the full<WG4136> assurance<WG4136> of understanding,<WG4907> to the acknowledgment<WG1922> of the mystery<WG3466> of God,<WG2316> and of the Father,<WG3962> and of Christ;<WG5547>
In whom<WG3739> are hid<WG614> all<WG3956> the treasures<WG2344> of wisdom<WG4678> and knowledge.<WG1108>
And this<WG5124> I say,<WG3004> lest<WG2443> <WG3361> any<WG3387> man should beguile<WG3884> you with enticing<WG4086> words.<WG4086>

For though<WG1499> I be absent<WG548> in the flesh,<WG4561> yet<WG235> am<WG1510> I with you in the spirit,<WG4151> rejoicing<WG5463> and beholding<WG991> your<WG5216> order,<WG5010> and the steadfastness<WG4733> of your<WG5216> faith<WG4102> in Christ.<WG5547>
As you have therefore<WG3767> received<WG3880> Christ<WG5547> Jesus<WG2424> the Lord,<WG2962> so walk<WG4043> you in him:
Rooted<WG4492> and built<WG2026> up in him, and established<WG950> in the faith,<WG4102> as you have been taught,<WG1321> abounding<WG4052> therein<WG1722> <WG846> with thanksgiving.<WG2169>

Beware<WG991> lest<WG3361> any<WG3387> man spoil<WG4812> you through<WG1223> philosophy<WG5385> and vain<WG2756> deceit,<WG539> after<WG2596> the tradition<WG3862> of men,<WG444> after<WG2596> the rudiments<WG4747> of the world,<WG2889> and not after<WG2596> Christ.<WG5547>
For in him dwells<WG2730> all<WG3956> the fullness<WG4138> of the Godhead<WG2320> bodily.<WG4985>
And you are complete<WG4137> in him, which<WG3739> is the head<WG2776> of all<WG3956> principality<WG746> and power:<WG1849>

In whom<WG3739> also<WG2532> you are circumcised<WG4059> with the circumcision<WG4061> made<WG1096> without<WG886> hands,<WG886> in putting<WG555> off<WG554> the body<WG4983> of the sins<WG266> of the flesh<WG4561> by the circumcision<WG4061> of Christ:<WG5547>

Buried<WG4916> with him in baptism,<WG908> wherein<WG1722> <WG3757> also<WG2532> you are risen<WG4891> with him through<WG1223> the faith<WG4102> of the operation<WG1753> of God,<WG2316> who<WG3588> has raised<WG1453> him from the dead.<WG3498>

And you, being<WG5607> dead<WG3498> in your<WG5216> sins<WG3900> and the uncircumcision<WG203> of your<WG5216> flesh,<WG4561> has he quickened<WG4806> together<WG4806> with him, having forgiven<WG5483> you all<WG3956> trespasses;<WG3900>

Blotting<WG1813> out the handwriting<WG5498> of ordinances<WG1378> that was against<WG2596> us, which<WG3739> was contrary<WG5227> to us, and took<WG142> it out of the way,<WG3319> nailing<WG4338> it to his cross;<WG4716>
And having spoiled<WG554> principalities<WG746> and powers,<WG1849> he made<WG1165> a show<WG1165> of them openly,<WG1722> <WG3954> triumphing<WG2358> over them in it.

Let no<WG3361> man<WG5100> therefore<WG3767> judge<WG2919> you in meat,<WG1035> or<WG2228> in drink,<WG4213> or<WG2228> in respect<WG3313> of an holy day,<WG1859> or<WG2228> of the new<WG3561> moon,<WG3561> or<WG2228> of the sabbath<WG4521> days:
Which<WG3739> are a shadow<WG4639> of things to come;<WG3195> but the body<WG4983> is of Christ.<WG5547>

Let no<WG3367> man<WG3367> beguile<WG2603> you of your reward<WG2603> in a voluntary<WG2309> humility<WG5012> and worshipping<WG2356> of angels,<WG32> intruding<WG1687> into those things which<WG3739> he has not seen,<WG3708> vainly<WG1500> puffed<WG5448> up by his fleshly mind,<WG3563>

And not holding<WG2902> the Head,<WG2776> from which<WG3739> all<WG3956> the body<WG4983> by joints<WG860> and bands<WG4886> having nourishment<WG2023> ministered,<WG2023> and knit<WG4822> together,<WG4822> increases<WG837> with the increase<WG838> of God.<WG2316>

Why<WG3767> if<WG1487> you be dead<WG599> with Christ<WG5547> from the rudiments<WG4747> of the world,<WG2889> why,<WG5101> as though living<WG2198> in the world,<WG2889> are you subject<WG1379> to ordinances,<WG1379>
(Touch<WG680> not; taste<WG1089> not; handle<WG2345> not;
Which<WG3739> all<WG3956> are to perish<WG5356> with the using;<WG671>) after<WG2596> the commandments<WG1778> and doctrines<WG1319> of men?<WG444>

Which<WG3748> things have<WG2192> indeed<WG3303> a show<WG3056> of wisdom<WG4678> in will<WG1479> worship,<WG1479> and humility,<WG5012> and neglecting<WG857> of the body:<WG4983> not in any<WG5100> honor<WG5092> to the satisfying<WG4140> of the flesh.<WG4561>
